import { useState } from "react" import { addHeaderField, addInputField } from "./worksheetInputs" export const TestModule2 = ({ user }) => { const [chosenInputs, setChosenInputs] = useState([]) const [userQuestions, setUserQuestions] = useState([]) const handleAddInputButton = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const copy = [...chosenInputs] copy.push(addInputField(userQuestions, setUserQuestions, chosenInputs)) setChosenInputs(copy) } // teacher view should be able to view ALL students she creater // parent view should be able to view only the student she syncs with the student code return ( <>
{addHeaderField()}
) }
